Ingredients.2: 3 cups peeled and cubed butternut squash

Ingredients.4: 1 cup sweet potatoes, peeled and chopped

Ingredients.5: 1 small red onion, cut into 8 wedges

Ingredients.9: 0.25 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a 12 x 18 inch sheet pan with parchment paper.

Directions.2: Combine parsnips, butternut squash, carrots, sweet potato, onion, olive oil, minced rosemary, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Stir to combine. Spread out vegetable mixture onto the prepared sheet pan.

Directions.3: Roast on the center rack of the preheated oven for 20 minutes. Stir and keep roasting until vegetables are fork tender, about 15 minutes.

Directions.4: Transfer to a serving platter and garnish with fresh rosemary sprigs.
